Invalid PidOptions input. XML should strictly adhere to spec. Invalid value for fType Invalid value for fCount Invalid value for iType Invalid value for iCount Internal error Success !!! Fingerprint Capture Successfully Alert !!! Pinpad device is not paired. Click on Pair for paring device PAIR Morpho RD Service No Device Found Unable to find any USB device connected or the USB device does not support the app. Please remove and connect the Biometric device with the phone. Unable to find Mantra Management Client app. Please install it from playstore. Unable to find Mantra RD Service app. Please install it from playstore. Unable to find FM220U RD Service app. Please install it from playstore. Unable to find Precision RD Service app. Please install it from playstore.
Morpho SCL RDService was not found. Please download it from the Playstore. Mantra RD Service FM220U RD Service Precision RD Service Mantra Management Client Device is not ready . Please wait !!! There are some error while scanning the finger. Please remove and connect the Biometric Device and try Again !!! Please scan your finger!!!
Update Available A new version of YOUR_APP_NAME is available. Please update to version\s now Update Before You Start Using AEPS Please make sure that you have installed the RD service App for the Biometric device. Flawless Transaction Through Your Fingertips The only thing you need is your fingerprint and your Aadhar Number. Easy Reporting Get all your transaction details reported seamlessly with just a click.

Help The permission is missing.\n\nTo grant this permission click on Settings, then Permissions and turn the permission on.\n\nThen click back twice to return to the app Exit App Settings
